strapiJob.title: Fitness Manager
strapiJob.description:
The Jones Center is now hiring for a Fitness Manager to manage the state-of-the-art fitness center. If you have a passion for fitness and want to work at a top-notch organization... Then this is a great opportunity for you!

What you'll be doing....

The Fitness Manager is responsible for overseeing fitness programs and fitness center staff. This full-time role reports directly to the Director of Recreation and works collaboratively with the Recreation staff. Duties include:

  • Coordinating all fitness related programs,
  • Assisting the Membership Coordinator with member retention programs,
  • Provide direction and instruction to staff involved in monitoring fitness center users.
  • Recruit and supervise student workers
  • Develop policy and procedures for classes and fitness center
  • Oversee maintenance of fitness equipment
  • Instruct staff and student workers in the safe use of equipment and in accepted exercise protocols for various program participants
  • Position requires flexible working hours possibly including evenings and weekends.

The ideal candidate will possess the following..

This position requires continuing education and/or training in fitness or exercise related programs and certifications. A bachelor's degree from an accredited exercise science, kinesiology or related program is preferred. Verifiable experience in supervising and leading staff in a work environment is required.

Come Join our Team!
